long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT for Google is a unique chrome extension that works alongside your regular search engine. It integrates with Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo and others, presenting AI responses together with regular search results. Composed of advanced algorithms and AI models like GPT-4, Bard, and Claude, it enhances your search experience by summarizing and categorizing information. Plus, it facilitates seamless user interactivity with features like 'Quick Ask' mode, Dark Mode, Markdown rendering and many more, making it an indispensable tool for everyone aiming to maximize their web searching capabilities.


Display GPT-4&Bard&Claude's intelligent answer alongside search engine's general results.Enhance your browsing experience with AI!
ChatGPT for Google is a extension shows AI response alongside Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo and other search engines.


Compared to the scattered and chaotic information from search engines, AI has already summarized and categorized these information for you, allowing you to see the results you want more intuitively. Moreover, you can ask further questions based on AI responses to gain a deeper understanding of the question.



ğŸ’ªThe Key Features:
ğŸ‘‰Search Enhance: Obtain concise, accurate answers to your questions right within the search engine interfaces you already use.
ğŸ‘‰Search Agent:  just ask a question, ChatGPT for Google will search using multiple keywords, review all the results, and find the right answer for you.
ğŸ‘‰All-In-One-Chat: Compare the answers of ChatGPT, GPT-4, Bard, and Claude in one page to enhance your search experience.
ğŸ‘‰Quick Ask: Enter "gpt" in the browser address bar, then press "Tab "or "Space" to enter quick ask mode.In Quick Ask mode, enter your query and hit "Enter" to instantly send it to ChatGPT or any AI Model you like.


ğŸ¥³ How ChatGPT for Google Outshines the Competition?
âœ”ï¸ Supports all popular search engines: Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo and other search engines.
âœ”ï¸ Supports official API (GPT-4, GPT-4 Turbo, Bard)
âœ”ï¸ Markdown rendering
âœ”ï¸ Code highlights
âœ”ï¸ Dark mode
âœ”ï¸ Custom trigger mode 
âœ”ï¸ Custom content text size
âœ”ï¸ Supports 50+ languages



â“ Frequently Asked Questions:
ğŸ“Œ What is ChatGPT for Google?
ChatGPT for Google is a browser extension that enhances search engines with the power of ChatGPT. It works by showing ChatGPT responses alongside normal search engine results.


ğŸ“Œ Is ChatGPT for Google free to use?
Yes, we offer limited use for free. For unlimited access, you can choose the Premium Plan.


ğŸ“Œ What search engines are supported?
Currently, ChatGPT for Google supports Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo and other search engines. More search engines will be supported in the future.


ğŸ“Œ Do I need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account?
ChatGPT for Google offers two usage modes: a free mode and a subscription-based mode. In the free version, users can utilize the search enhancement feature by either signing into their personal OpenAI ChatGPT account or by applying their own OpenAI API key. Conversely, the premium mode allows users full access to all features without the need for any API keys or OpenAI account.
